description: Our mulled wine berry-packed cobbler is the perfect winter warming dessert ideal for cosy nights in with family and friends.
name: Mulled Wine Berry & Orange Cobbler Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 punnet rosemary, leaves picked, roughly chopped
1.75 cup Woolworths thickened cream, whipped (save1 cup, to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Place berries and cornflour in a large bowl and toss gently to coat. Stir in wine, 1/2 cup sugar, mixed spice, zest and orange juice. Transfer to an 8-cup capacity ovenproof rectangular dish. Bake for 30 minutes or until sauce bubbles and has thickened slightly.

Meanwhile, place flour and remaining sugar in a medium bowl. Rub butter into flour mixture until it resembles fine breadcrumbs. Stir in 3/4 cup almonds and rosemary. Gradually stir in cream until a soft, sticky dough forms.
Dollop spoonfuls of dough over berry mixture. Scatter with remaining almonds. Bake for 30 minutes or until top is golden and puffed. Serve with extra cream.
